change_plan.question: Can I switch plans at any time?
change_plan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade or switch between plans at any time without penalties. When you change plans in the middle of a billing cycle, we apply automatic proration: if you upgrade to a higher plan, your next billing will reflect the proportional cost of the time remaining at the new price. If you downgrade to a lower plan, a credit is accumulated and applied to your next billing. You don't lose data or access: the change is applied immediately.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) via Stripe for international customers. In Argentina, we process local payments via MercadoPago (account balance, cards) and offer direct bank transfer for annual plans.

data_retention.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
data_retention.answer: Your data is retained on our servers for 90 days after cancellation, allowing you to reactivate your account without losing information. After 90 days, the data is permanently deleted. You can export your data at any time before cancellation.

billing_cycle.question: Can I change my billing cycle?
billing_cycle.answer: Yes. You can change your billing cycle at any time from your plan settings. If you switch from monthly to annual, a price adjustment is applied to your next billing. If you switch from annual to monthly, the change takes effect at the end of your current annual cycle.

user_roles.question: How do user limits and roles work?
user_roles.answer: For the Free plan (1 user), only you have access. In Pro (1 user) it is also individual but with more capabilities. In Teams (unlimited users), you can add members and assign them roles with specific permissions. If you downgrade from Teams to Pro or Free, additional members automatically lose access, but their data is preserved if you reinvite more users later.

enterprise.question: What is included in the Enterprise plan?
enterprise.answer: The Enterprise plan is designed for large organizations that need a customized solution. Includes: unlimited users at no additional cost per seat, on-premise deployment if necessary, SSO with your identity provider, custom training for your team, a dedicated account manager, and 99.9% SLA with 24/7 priority support. This is ideal for construction companies with more than 50 employees or real estate developers that handle multiple projects simultaneously. For prices and options, <contact>contact our sales team</contact>.

NotFound.title: Oops! We lost the blueprints...

essence.title: A unique and unrepeatable opportunity
essence.description1: The Founding Members Program is a <bold>limited-time offer</bold> designed to form a select group of committed users who will act as strategic product advisors.
essence.description2: Your direct feedback will help us <bold>accelerate development</bold> and prioritize the features that really matter to construction professionals.
essence.description3: In exchange for your commitment, you will receive <bold>exclusive lifetime benefits</bold> that will never again be available to new users.

organizational.title: Organizational Benefit
organizational.description: Founder status applies to your entire Organization, not just you. All team members automatically inherit the benefits.

It's currently the most complete Archicad course in Spanish, a program valued at <bold>USD $169/year</bold> that you can enjoy at no additional cost while you maintain your active subscription.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have questions? Here are the most common answers.

items.whatIsIncludedAnswer: The course includes full access to all modules and lessons, downloadable practice files, access to the exclusive Discord community, certificate of completion, and future updates at no extra cost.
items.howLongAccess: How long do I have access?
items.howLongAccessAnswer: Access is lifetime. Once you enroll, you can watch the content as many times as you want, whenever you want, with no time limits.
items.needPriorKnowledgeAnswer: No prior experience is necessary. The course is designed to take you from zero to professional level, step by step.
items.whichVersion: Which software version do I need?
items.whichVersionAnswer: We recommend using the latest version of the software. The course is compatible with versions 24, 25, and 26.
items.getCertificate: How do I get my certificate?
items.getCertificateAnswer: Upon completing all course lessons, your digital certificate will be automatically generated for you to download and share on LinkedIn.
items.moneyBackAnswer: Yes, we offer a 30-day guarantee. If the course doesn't meet your expectations, we'll refund 100% of your money, no questions asked.

testimonials.title: What our students say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from professionals who transformed their careers

Privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection Policy
Privacy.intro: At Seencel, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information.

about.title: About Seencel
about.description: Seencel is a comprehensive management platform for construction and architecture. We offer tools for project management, budget tracking, team management, documentation, financial analysis, and professional training.
about.services: Our services include: Project management, multi-currency financial tracking, staff management, documentation, training, AI analysis, geolocation, and payments.

applicability.title: Applicability
applicability.description: This Policy applies when you visit our website, register, use our services, participate in training, make payments, interact with our AI, or contact us.

direct.title: Information You Provide Directly
items: Contact Information: Name, email, phone, country, date of birth.
Professional Information: Organization, job title, specialization.
Account Information: Username, password (encrypted), photo, preferences.
Transactional Information: Billing data, purchase history.
User Content: Documents, files, images, notes.
Project Information: Budgets, tasks, personnel, schedules.

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
items: Usage: Pages visited, time spent, navigation patterns.
Location: Approximate by IP or precise if you authorize GPS.

google.title: Google Data We Access
google.description: When you sign in with Google, we access:
items: User ID: Unique identifier for authentication.
google.disclaimer: We only access the minimum necessary information. We do not access your Gmail emails, Drive, or Calendar. We do not store your Google password.
google.maps: When you use Google Maps, we process GPS coordinates and map visualization data for project geolocation.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Service Provision: Create accounts, authentication, process project data.
Service Improvement: Analyze usage, A/B testing, train AI models.
Security: Prevent fraud, comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
sharing.policy: We do not sell or rent your information. We only share data with trusted service providers under strict confidentiality obligations:
sharing.legal: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect rights and safety.

security.title: Storage and Protection
security.description: We use TLS/SSL encryption in transit and industry standards at rest. We implement Row Level Security (RLS), robust authentication, and regular encrypted backups.

retention.title: Retention and Deletion
retention.description: We retain data while the account is active. You can request full deletion (processed in 30 days) via 'Delete Account' in Profile or by contacting privacy@seencel.com.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict, and port your data. Contact us at privacy@seencel.com to exercise them.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For privacy inquiries: privacy@seencel.com or contact@seencel.com.
